title: Confessed killer of Queens mom went to Chipotle just HOURS before his arrest - Daily Mail

description: David Bonola allegedly went to Chipotle hours before being arrested for Orsolya Gaal's murder. Staff said he was 'as friendly as ever' during his visit. He was a regular at the restaurant.
